author: gnodet
msg: Abstract JDBC operations so that they can be reused in JDBC auditor.
The implementation is borrowed from ActiveMQ, thus all major databases are supported.

author: dreid
msg: Add a reporting function and catch up with recent changes
to the XSLT module. Support will need to be updated before this will run.
I have no idea how minoatur is setup for projects otherwise I'd have
updated all there. The site looks to be on some sort of manual
update cycle as changes from last night still haven't landed, but
whoever is maintaingin/updating it will need to ensure the support
modules ahve been updated or the script will fail.
The reporting is very untested as the zones machine doesn't
allow mail. If it does work the moderators for site-dev will
need to allow posts from Marvin to make it through.
